data.prayer: Father, please send new teachers into the harvest, who can correct the lies of our enemy in the state of Serravalle, San Marino.
data.verse: Ask the Lord of the harvest, therefore, to send out workers into his harvest field.

data.location_label: Photo from the state of Serravalle, San Marino
data.section_summary: What beauty can God be thanked for in this photo?

data.prayer: Lord, please give apostles to expand the church into every neighborhood of Serravalle, San Marino.
data.verse: Therefore go and make disciples of all nations, baptizing them in the name of the Father and of the Son and of the Holy Spirit, and teaching them to obey everything I have commanded you.

data.prayer: Spirit, help the church in the state of Serravalle do things that will multiply their numbers, not just add to them.
data.verse: But thanks be to God, who always leads us triumphantly as captives in Christ and through us spreads everywhere the fragrance of the knowledge of Him.

data.prayer: Father, you know every soul, and you know who are yours and who are yet to be yours out of the 11,100 people living in Serravalle, San Marino. Please, call your lost sheep to yourself.
data.verse: For I will take you out of the nations; I will gather you from all the countries and bring you back into your own land.

data.prayer: Spirit, please defend the 8 believers in Serravalle against self-centered spirituality. Open their eyes to the fields ripe for harvest around them.
Jesus, strengthen the church in Serravalle, San Marino by giving a prophet, as you said you would, who is bold and willing to correct. Lord, may the believers care about holiness as you do.
data.verse: So Christ himself gave the apostles, the prophets, the evangelists, the pastors and teachers, to equip his people for works of service, so that the body of Christ may be built up

data.prayer: Father, look after and teach the way that is best for the 8 believers living in Serravalle, San Marino.
data.verse: I will instruct you and teach you in the way you should go. I will counsel you with my loving eye on you.
